title: Bug 116994There is "create template item" in a library editor, after selecting it error message pops up.
description: Description: There is "create template item" in a library editor, afterselecting it error message pops up.Steps to reproduce:1. Add a label in a library file.2. Right click on it and select "Create template report item".3. Error message pops up "Error.TemplateException.TEMPLATEITEMNOTSUPPORTED".
